html:
** Shares of U.S. technology giants Alphabet Inc GOOGL.O, Apple Inc AAPL.O, Meta Platforms FB.O, Amazon.com Inc AMZN.O and Microsoft Corp MSFT.O down between 1.9% and 2.5% premarket

** Twitter Inc TWTR.N and Snap Inc SNAP.N also down ~2%

** Futures tracking the tech-heavy Nasdaq 100 index .NDX slump almost 2% as traders return from a long holiday weekend to position for a more hawkish Federal Reserve ahead of a policy meeting next week (Full Story)

** Tech stocks generally weaken with rising bond yields and interest rates as investors tend to discount future tech earnings in comparison to higher debt returns

** Electric vehicle maker Tesla Inc TSLA.O down 2.5% at $1023.50

** Semiconductor firms Intel Corp INTC.O, Nvidia Corp NVDA.O, Advanced Micro Devices AMD.O down between 1.3% and 2.7%

** Mobility cos Uber UBER.N and Lyft LYFT.O down 1.7% and 2.6%

** Meanwhile, a U.S. Senate panel is set to debate a bill on Thursday that aims to rein in app stores of companies that some lawmakers say exert too much market control, including AAPL and GOOGL (Full Story)


(Reporting by Yuvraj Malik in Bengaluru)

(( yuvraj.malik@thomsonreuters.com ))
